mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_details (order_id, product_id, product_name, product_price, quantity, subtotal) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity}, #{subtotal});
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_id, o.product_id, o.product_name, o.product_price, o.quantity, o.subtotal, p.image_url FROM order_details o INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id WHERE order_id = #{id}
